meaningMnemonic: <kanji>One</kanji> <kanji>cord</kanji> is enough to tie you <vocabulary>together</vocabulary> with someone. Imagine an invisible cord stretching between you and the people you do things together with. That one cord is like a symbol of your togetherness. Very poetic (or very Death Stranding), right?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. The 一 becomes いっ.
